text:
I've been writing once I've hoping to publish in the next few weeks since I've received so many poorly designed files lately (1600px wide with really small fonts, fancy text wrapping around background images that I have no idea what they expect it to do on mobile... etc.). I'm writing it as a "helpful guide to designing email" except it's really a list of my pet peeves. I'm happy to take suggestions!

I did find this one but it's a bit long: <https://blog.chamaileon.io/email-newsletter-design-best-practices/>
